name: SteamWorld Heist
synopsis: Now available: DLC and more languages (French, Italian, German, Spanish and Russian)! 10/10 - Daily Mirror: "A work of art‚Äù 9/10 - Nintendo Life: "Excellent" 8.8/10 - IGN: "SteamWorld Heist stole my heart" From the makers of SteamWorld Dig: In SteamWorld Heist, you command a robot squad in a series of epic tactical shootouts. It's turn-based strategy with a twist: You manually aim the guns of your crewmates, allowing for insane skill shots and bullet-bouncing action! As the captain of a steam-driven pirate crew you will board, loot and shoot your way through enemy spaceships. Overcome the challenges of the vast frontier by upgrading your recruits with unique abilities, weapons - and even stylish hats! Key features Strategy focused on skill rather than chance Procedurally generated levels 15-20 hours of playtime, followed by New Game+ Kind to newcomers, deep and challenging for veterans Expand the game with DLC Soundtrack by Steam Powered Giraffe
